span.a: SCOPE Emergency Child Care for Age 5-12

span.style: background-color: white; font-family: calibri, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(192, 0, 0);
font-size: 14px; background-color: white; font-family: calibri, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

span.span: Please click here to view all day care centers in Nassau County who are able to service First Responders' and Emergency Healthcare Workers' children

for ages 0-5. Any essential workers needing child care in Nassau County can call (516) 727-0331 to be connected with a referral specialist who will identify available child care programs that meet each parent’s needs.
